message.content: This question requires some basic knowledge about sedimentary rock and the types of materials that are commonly found in it. Sedimentary rock is formed from the accumulation of sediment, which can include materials such as sand, clay, and organic matter. Fossilized remains, such as dinosaur bodies, are often found in sedimentary rock formations. Option (B) is incorrect because flutes are musical instruments and are not commonly found in sedimentary rock. Option (C) is partially correct, as pebbles can be found in sedimentary rock, but it is not the most common material. Option (D) is unrelated to sedimentary rock.
